name: Mixtape in Freelancer Safehouse
description: Spawns the mixtape on the supplier desk

options.name: Legal Mixtape
options.tooltip: Now makes the mixtape a legal item to hold and carry. Note: NPCs will pick it up when spotted

options.name: Walkman 47
options.tooltip: Now makes the mixtape a definite item in your inventory just like the camera. Note: Checking this option will remove it from the desk spawn. Check your inventory.

options.name: No Boost
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio range stays default

options.name: 200% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is now double the range. Roughly 10 meters

options.name: 250% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is double and a half the range. Start counting

options.name: 300% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is triple the range

options.name: 400% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is now quadruple the range.

options.name: 600% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is now 6 times the range. Range visualization is impossible to be displayed properly now

options.name: 800% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is now 8 times the range.

options.name: 1000% Volume
options.tooltip: The Mixtape audio is now 10 times the range.
